Introduction
This topic contains information on applications for automobile and adaptive equipment allowance, including
applying for
the automobile allowance
, and
adaptive equipment
, and
handling incomplete applications for the automobile allowance or adaptive equipment
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Automobile and Adaptive Equipment Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. Chapter 39
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
